mapper.select: INSERT INTO at_user_reply(id, user_id, project_id, content) VALUES (user_reply_id_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{projectId}, #{content})

SELECT ur.user_id as "userId", ur.project_id as projectId, ur.content as "content", TO_CHAR(ur.create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "regDate", u.profile as "profile" FROM AT_user_reply ur, AT_user u WHERE ur.project_id = #{projectId} and ur.user_id = u.id ORDER BY ur.create_date
